text:
(The live is drawing near, but I still haven't made much
time for Mamimi's lessons... I'm starting to worry a bit.)

Huh?
The key for the lesson room is gone...
So you're doing your best to practice even this late?

Nah, I wouldn't say I'm "doing my best".
I just happened to have some open time, so...

No, there's no way that's the case...
Sorry that I haven't properly made time for you.

If there's anything I can do to help you out,
Please tell me.

Well, I'm going to practice a little longer
so please stick around to help me kill time.
